title: Lazy Lizard Restaurant: A Family-Friendly Dining Spot
blurb: Enjoy home-style food and drinks in a relaxed setting.
description: Lazy Lizard is a restaurant that offers a relaxed and family-friendly dining experience. With a focus on home-style food and a variety of drinks, it's a great place for families to gather and enjoy a meal together. The restaurant provides a comfortable atmosphere where parents can unwind while kids enjoy the menu options. It is designed to cater to families looking for a casual dining experience with a diverse menu to suit different tastes. The venue also hosts events and happenings, making it a vibrant spot for the community. The restaurant aims to provide a welcoming environment for families and individuals alike.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free every weekend & PH.

title: Little Lazy Lizard - Bukit Timah Family Dining
blurb: Family-friendly dining at Bukit Timah Road, Singapore.
description: Little Lazy Lizard at Bukit Timah Road offers a relaxed and family-friendly dining experience. Enjoy a diverse menu in a comfortable setting, perfect for gatherings with loved ones. The restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere for families looking to enjoy a meal together. With a variety of dishes to choose from, there's something for everyone to enjoy. The location is easily accessible and provides a convenient dining option for residents and visitors alike. The restaurant aims to provide a memorable dining experience for all its guests.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free every weekend & PH.
